input: Execute a batch request for mandates with 'One-Off' SEPA type and validity in 2023.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /DirectDebitMandates?$filter=DirectDebitCollectionSEPASequenceTypeCode eq 'OOFF' and year(ValidityPeriod/StartDate) eq 2023 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
